string.caption: AS Host
string.description: Identifies the SAP application server. Host name or IP address of a specific SAP application server (such as sap.mulesoft.com, localhost, or 192.168.0.1) that will be used as the jco.client.ashost JCO logon property.
string.name: jcoAsHost

string.caption: User
string.description: Specifies the login user ID for logging in to the SAP system. This is a string representing the user id that will be used as the jco.client.user JCO logon property.
string.name: jcoUser

password.caption: Password
password.description: Password for logging in to the SAP system. This is a string representing the password that will be used as the jco.client.passwd JCO logon property.
password.name: jcoPasswd

string.caption: SAP System Number
string.description: Indicates the SAP system number. This is a string (such as 00, 01, etc.) representing the SAP system number that will be used as the jco.client.sysnr JCO logon property.
string.name: jcoSysnr

string.caption: SAP Client
string.description: Specifies the SAP client. Three-digit client number; preserve leading zeros if they appear in the number. This is a string (such as 100, 001, etc.) representing the JCO client id that will be used as the jco.client.client JCO logon property.
string.name: jcoClient

string.caption: Login Language
string.description: Specifies a login language. ISO two-character language code (for example, EN, DE, FR), or SAP-specific single-character language code. This is a string (such as EN, ES ,etc.) representing the language that will be used as the jco.client.lang JCO property. Default value is EN.
string.name: jcoLang

integer.caption: Pool Capacity
integer.description: Maximum number of idle connections kept open by the destination. A value of 0 has the effect that there is no connection pooling. This will be used as the jco.client.poolCapacity JCO property.
integer.name: jcoPoolCapacity

integer.caption: Peak Limit
integer.description: Maximum number of active connections that can be created for a destination simultaneously. This will be used as the jco.destination.peak_limit JCO property.
integer.name: jcoPeakLimit

boolean.description: Whether JCO function templates are cached or not. Setting this flag to true is not recommended as it affects performance (Recommended for development if BAPIs are getting changed in SAP)
boolean.caption: Disable Function Template Cache
boolean.name: disableFunctionTemplateCache

boolean.description: A boolean representing whether trace will be enabled that will be used as the jco.client.trace JCO property. Default value is false.
boolean.caption: JCo Trace
boolean.name: jcoTrace

boolean.description: A boolean representing whether JCO trace will be sent to Mule ESB log files or to its own trace files. Setting this to true will override the behaviour of -Djco.trace_path=/path/to/trace.
boolean.caption: JCo Trace to Mule Log
boolean.name: jcoTraceToLog
